website_summaries.verdict: Awesome way to get clean  floors without exerting too much effort.
pros: It does practically all the work for you
Scrub rotation mimics hands and knees cleaning approach
Works on everything from laminate to hardwood to marble
Lightweight – easy to carry from room to room and floor to floor
Soft pads ensure you won’t scratch any sealed flooring – a perk for those with newer hardwood
Many owners love that you trigger the release of cleaning fluid
cons: Works best if you remove, wash, and dry cleaning pads after every use
Some say cleaning pads get dirty fast
Don’t expect to burn a lot of calories using this machine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly, a remarkable appliance for someone who HATES mopping, like me! I opened the item tonight, quickly assembled it which took less than 2 minutes, and away I went! I "mopped" my entire 900 sq. ft. apartment in less than 15 minutes, with very, very minimal effort. Just turn it on, occasionally spray the cleaning solution and go. Seriously, it couldn't be any easier. The white microfiber cloth afterwards was BLACK on the bottom, so I know it worked...and I thought my floors were clean!!! Just spend the $99 and get it, and never handle a drippy mop again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Can't beIieve I waited this long to buy one
customer_reviews.text: Great electric mop. My wife being a nurse is picky about the floors being cleaned. This mop has power and really gets up the dirt. We live on a farm and have a lot of mud and it does the job. It will not pick up particles on the floor so you have to vacuum prior to use. The cleaning pads are thick.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This power floor cleaner is amazing! Prior to receiving this order I had been using swiffers and similar products. While those did the job and cost less, in comparison the finished product always left something lacking. The Bissell arrived with a trial size bottle of floor cleaner solution and a couple pads. Make sure to clean the floor first and then let the Bissell work it’s magic. I like that the sprayer is focused on what is just ahead versus the way the many competitor products spray everything within a 10foot radius. The cleaner works quietly and is simple to use. It is like having a mini floor buffer.
customer_reviews.author: Dinks_no_more

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Cleaning Your Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: This hardwood floor mop is amazing. It is extremely lightweight yet sturdy. The water tank has lines on it to indicate how much water to add and how much product to add. It comes with an extra set of pads and 2 small bottles of all purpose cleaner. I chose to spray Bona on my hardwood floors and use the mop to buff the floor. I used the included all purpose cleaner on my tile floors. My hardwood floors have a very professional-looking shine after using this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bigred

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely disappointed in this product and would
customer_reviews.text: I give this one star simply because I can't type the review without clicking a star. The pads are clearly for polishing only and not picking anything, even though it comes with polishing and 'scrubbing' pads. Not even dog prints were removed using the scrubbing pads. I am extremely disappointed in this product and would. It recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: pmon0326

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Just received and went to work on my wood looking tile that had such a build up with different floor cleans. Used Windex with vineager (can't use anything with ammonia because of my Chi's allergies). First used the scrubber pads with Windex then changed to polish pads and the tile came out streak free....yey!!! The machine is light weight but heavy enough to use effortlessly. I used to Swiffer but that's too much work plus after awhile left floor streaked. Highly recommend this product. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Linda Archuleta

customer_reviews.title: but I am very disappointed now, The pads aren't absorbent enough to sop ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for the arrival of this item,but I am very disappointed now, The pads aren't absorbent enough to sop up the liquid.and leave circles,This mop does not clean stains and It does not remove any dirty, It's a complete waste of money. I want return it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Barn

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: My house is 3500 square foot of hardwood floor, got tired of the Bona mop trigger breaking and buying new ones. Bought this and not expecting it to work...WRONG! OMG I love it. The spots that took elbow grease... just 2 seconds of holding the Spinwave over the spot, its gone. Who ever said this is a piece of crap is totally wrong. This is so great that I bought 2 more for vacation houses. My cleaning Lady loves it! The pads are made really nice and they are thick with scrubbing lines in them. You will love this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I spray my wood floor cleaner on ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Spinwave to use on my hardwood floors. I love it. I spray my wood floor cleaner on floor as I go, I do not use the sprayer on the Spinwave exempt on the tile floor in bathrooms and laundry room. I bought extra cleaning pads so that I could use one set on my hardwood floors and other set on my tile. They are easy to wash. I love mine so much I purchased another for my mother for Christmas. It just glides easy and makes mopping so much easier. I had a shark steamer before and I think the Spinwave is just easier to use. I thought the price was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: TONYA METCALF

customer_reviews.title: Streaks Floors and Makes a Mess
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't clean any better than a regular mop, leaves the sealed hardwood streaky and need to mop after using just for the floor to look clean
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great floor cleaner!!
customer_reviews.text: I have laminate floors in main living space and tiles in my 2 bathrooms. I have 3 kids and one big, drooly, hairy, smelly dog! This machine gets my floors spotless with little effort! It is so easy to use wish I would have purchased this product sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Need cotton pads
customer_reviews.text: Stopped spinning after less than two months. People complaining about circles on the floor is because the synthetic pads do not pick up dirt but spread it around.
customer_reviews.author: ToniRae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laminate polisher
customer_reviews.text: We have had this a few months now. Excellent for cleaning and polishing laminate plus hard wood floors. We use this device for our tile kitchen as well. Do not put the polish in the machine just squirt on the floor and it buffs to an awesome shine.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: reliability = 3/10
customer_reviews.text: The mop function works good. However it breaks down after about 6-10 months of use. The first one I bought broke after about 8 month and the second one I bought also broke down after about 6 months due to the same problem. All of sudden the right disc won't turn. The both unit's right disc stopped turning. So this must be design flaw. I've had it with Bissell product. I will never buy anything with Bissell name on it.
customer_reviews.author: iBang

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 use. Wouldn’t purchase again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item suddenly stopped working after using 2 times. After Reading many reviews for this product I made a decision to purchase it, as it appears to be exactly what I wanted. Unfortunately I’m extremely disappointed in the fact that the thing suddenly stopped working shortly after I started using it. I did all troubleshooting recommended for the product when faced with this difficulty and nothing. It’s a very cute product but big mistake!!!!! If I’m expected to buy replacement parts after 2 uses it not worth purchasing. Wish there’s a way to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a time saving cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It didn't clean as well as I expected. It only goes over the surfaces, it doesn't scrub them! Also doesn't get in the corners! The time spent filling the cleaner bottle and then cleaning the pads is time consuming. You can use the pads again until you wash them - I don't use it too often. Mistake for me to have a purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McCall

customer_reviews.title: Good product for cleaning LVT
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on my LVT floor. Cleaning wasn't quite as good as expected but I may need to use more solution. It's easy to use and does get out scuffs and "smears" better than my Shark. I like the unit and will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handled drywall mud like a champ
customer_reviews.text: We are doing drywall work throughout our house and it’s a nightmare. There’s mud and dust everywhere. This spinning mop (with just warm water!) has been amazing at washing away the dried mud. I took a drywall knife and chipped off any bigger clumps of mud, but as you can see in the video, the LVP floor is in horrible shape and the mop handles it really well The unit pulls a bit, and it can take a little effort to control depending on its angle, but you get the hang of it quickly. Overall, I really love this and I have used it with Bona products with success. I haven’t used the bissell formula that came with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not for hardwood floor. Removed shine and made my floor dull
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product hoping it would be a safe and effective cleaner for my hardwood floor. Instead it removed every ounce of shine from my floor. My floor is now dull looking and feels even worse to walk on. I followed the instructions. I tried cleaning with the solution provided. And after it damaged my floor. I tried using bona cleaner with no help. It may be great for ceramic tile. But definitely not for hardwood floors. I regret this purchase
customer_reviews.author: F.Mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: If you're needing a new mop, you need this.
customer_reviews.text: It's important to note that you might need to rinse the pads out or switch out to clean pads while cleaning large, high-traffic areas. This does not collect dirty water off the floor, just scrubs your floors with the pads that pop off and on. It does work really well though. My floors look so much cleaner after using this than with my Bissel Crosswave. I am planning on buying extra pads so that I can just pop the dirty ones off and put clean ones on as I do larger areas. The pads can be washed in the washer as well, so it's really convenient compared to other products that need multiple parts removed and cleaned after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great on High Gloss Tile Floors
customer_reviews.text: The floors in my house are high gloss tiles and cleaning them is painful. I would steam clean the floors and they would get hazy and I then would need to go over them again with a large microfiber towel to get the shine back. With this buffing unit, it cuts the time in half. Unfortunately, it is still a 2 step process - steam clean and then buff it shinny but much better than buffing the floors on your knees. It does get the dirt that steam cleaning alone misses. I am glad I purchased this and would recommend it - especially if you have high gloss floors.
customer_reviews.author: DanDaMan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and cleans effectively
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to replace a steam cleaner that I use to clean tile and hardwood floors. The spinwave is much easier to use. I only have to apply minimal pressure while using it and the spinning pads break up stains, food, and other things stuck to the floors, ensuring that they are cleaned well. I prefer not to the use the cleaning formula that is sold for this mop as it leaves a sticky residue on the floor. Instead, I make a DIY cleaner using vinegar and dishwashing soap and spray it on the floor before going in with the mop.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is spectacular. I have wood floors in my home, including the kitchen. Kitchen floors get cruddy so quickly and I am unable to get on my hands and knees any longer. The rotating mop pads do a wonderful job. In front of the stove I let the spinwave hover a little longer to get up cooking messes. It is light weight and easy to use. My only suggestion to the manufacturer would be to make the pads and inch or two wider so that the spinwave would cover a larger area. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ripper

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!
customer_reviews.text: This beats the fire out of traditional mops and the typical spray cleaning mops. It's easy to use, it does all the work for you, and cleans well while buffing your floors. No more straing your back and push/pull action, this one glides and you only guide it. Now to see how it stands the test of time. Other sprayer mops I used from Bona ended up not spraying anymore or leaking after some time. The only downfall is dealing with the power cord, which isn't terrible. I hope to get many years of usage from this one.
customer_reviews.author: John k

customer_reviews.title: Best Solution so far
customer_reviews.text: I have approx 2500 sq.ft. of cherry hardwood floors and three dogs! My wife & I have used just about every product out there, from spinning buckets, those velcro pad thing a jigs, and almost every device typically found in the cleaning supplies isle of your favorite grocery or big box store. My wife wanted to give this a go. I was skeptical but after the first usage and knew we were onto something. Not claiming it's perfect, but what is? We love it! It'seasy to use, very little liquid (maybe 1/4 cup to do all our floors), cuts drying time down to next to nothing. Hey, anything that makes our lives easier, I'm going to let you know!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alvord

customer_reviews.title: The one time it worked I was very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I got to use it once before it died and wouldn't work. The sprayer worked when it was plugged in. Amazon refunded my money even though it was 1 or 2 days past the 30 days. It says it comes with a 2 yr warranty. The one time it worked I was very pleased with it. Buy with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie D.

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome...until it quickly broke!
customer_reviews.text: I wish this didn’t break 3 weeks after I bought it! It was a great price for the product; easy to assemble and use; did a great job on tile, wood, and laminate floors. Unfortunately, the third time I used it, it simply stopped working and now it won’t turn on at all. I planned on getting a replacement, however, a friend purchased one after loving mine, and hers was faulty right out of the box. Two out of two broken makes me think I should buy another brand. So sad because I liked the product. Amazon was great about issuing a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: I'm in LOVE with a MOP!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute BEST cleaning gadget I have purchased! I plan on purchasing a back up just to make sure I will always have this! I have a home full of Wood Laminate flooring and pushing a mop back and forth would cause major back pain with in minutes. I turned this spin mop on and Mopped the entire house with ease! I could not give this product enough stars!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE! Take my word on it a purchase this NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The circular mop is easy to use! I was amazed how well it cleaned my hardwood floors. Sometimes I had to go over a spot several times, but my floors were in need of a deep cleaning. Perhaps I need to rinse, but I there are circular patterns when the floor dried. Eventually, they will fade away. I would give it 5 stars, but there has to be a flaw I am overlooking.
customer_reviews.author: Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received has to go back. The handle simply refused to click into place. I called Bessel Customer Service and they wasted my time and were absolutely NO help. I decided to just go through Amazon and they sent another one in a day. It went together just as it was suppose to. I love how effortlessly it cleans. My floors were not dirty, YET the pads did show that they did indeed have some dirt on them. I am super glad I found the Bissell SpinWave!! UPDATE: LESS THEN 2 YEARS OLD it stopped spinning on one side. I bought a 3 year warranty so hopefully I get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sackrison

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it- Buy a Crosswave
customer_reviews.text: We moved in our new house and tried to decide if the Spineave or Crosseave was what we wanted. After researching and cost we thought the Spinwave would be great. Wrong. It is awful and a complete waste of money. Sure, it cleans the obvious smeared dirt off the floor and makes it shine but the little sand pebbles or actual pieces of sand were still there. I hate walking on flooring that’s gritty feeling. Fast forward a few months and we are now owners of the Crosswave that works amazing! Don’t waste your money on this just upgrade to the Crosseave and do your self a favor. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not best quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on Nov 2019. And I am writing this review August 2020. I have used this mop 2-3 times per week. Pros: Very light weight. Easy to use. Cleans very well. I loved it. But it stopped working. Cons: the left spinning pad stopped working last month (after 8 months). I was hoping it would last at least 1 or 2 years. I was disappointed. Very disappointed. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: This works great on ceramic tile...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that was easier to use than a mop and bucket, this does the job. Good for weekly maintenance, it won't do deeeeep scrubbing in you have tile with a lot of grooves, but I can hit those areas with a handheld scrubber. Once it's all setup, then it's just a matter of maintenance. It also buffs wood floors very nicely. Overall very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper#10M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move as long as it is ON
customer_reviews.text: We have combination Hardwood and Tile. Easy to move as long as it is ON, OFF very heavy for me. the cleaning solution leaves flooring very streaked and dull; so I went back and used only HOT WATER and it worked much better. Wish I could use Vinegar and Water but according to manual that would VOID THE WARRANTY! BUT it beats mopping and using a steamer!!
customer_reviews.author: contractor lady

customer_reviews.title: BEST. MOP. EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Seriously....wow! I have major back and leg issues due to an autoimmune disease and I just cannot use a traditional mop. My friend who has RA, told me about this one, and I am just amazed. It cleans the floor amazingly well with very little effort. No strain on my back at all! Everyone needs one of these! Thank you Bissell!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Zonni

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, excellent cleaning, low price and the best purchases I have made
customer_reviews.text: my floors are laminated I tried with a steam machine but it left the floor marked and I had to return them because they really didn't clean well a baby came to my house and I felt ashamed because she was left with all the dirty clothes when she was on the floor and I bought this machine and it is not good it is excellent fast wine easy to assemble easy to put the product extremely light extremely effective saves product from cleaning the floor I used it with an excellent clean make a whistle sounds when one throws the product which helps not to spend much I have no words I'm happy, I love her, she's excellent
customer_reviews.author: cecilia mombru

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ABSOLUTE BEST purchase I have made recently! I had just a standard shark steam mop before but my floors just never felt clean. This has changed the game! I was worried the spinning heads might scratch my floors but it’s the perfect amount of pressure to clean. I will be buying one for everyone in my family that doesn’t have one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't scrub quite as well as I'd like but does its job
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this mop for quite a year yet but it's working well for me so far. It definitely could use better scrubbing power. I've tried it on several small stains and it doesn't get the stains out. It's much more for polishing and mopping than it is for scrubbing. However, I'm happy with it for the price and efficiency. It's lightweight and quiet and easy to use. But if you've got some spots on your floor, you'll have to use your elbow grease over this tool.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Easy :)
customer_reviews.text: I have a physical condition that makes it harder for me to clean my floors the way I was taught to... i.e. on my hands and knees scrubbing. I thought this mop would help me, and it truly has exceeded my expectations. I've only used it once so far, but I love the ease of usage and how incredibly light it is. The water reservoir is large enough so that I can feasibly do the whole downstairs without stopping to fill it up again. So, in short, this beauty saves my back and knees, and the rotating buffer/sponges get the floors really spotless! I would give this 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: We have hardwood floors through out and I hate the swiffer mops so it is far and few between that these floors get cleaned. I decided to take the plunge and all I can say is WOW!! Incredibly easy to use and does an amazing job. I did the entire house on a single tank fill and had some left over. We have 2 toddlers and 2 dogs and it cut through everything, leaving a nice sparkly floor. The mop pads cleaned up incredibly well and were a breeze to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: FrmthMind

customer_reviews.title: Saves a little getting down on your hands and knees
customer_reviews.text: This unit does somewhat clean your floor, but does not do a deep cleaning. I have vinyl flooring in my kitchen and dirt gets into small "veins". It takes scrubbing with a hand brush to get them clean. I was hoping this unit would avoid that, but it doesn't. It is basically just a power mop, getting off surface dirt, but not deep cleaning. It is easy to use although I had to fight to get the handle to snap in the first time. I'm not sorry I bought it as I will use it frequently just to keep up with the surface dirt, but I was really hoping for a deep clean.
customer_reviews.author: rjohn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good for general use. Easy to use and cleans in less time than the swiffer and no residue left on my wood floors. However, I have kids and pets and sometimes have spills and things that may need a little more elbow grease to clean up. This does not seem to do well on those messes. Overall, it’s great but not great for those icky sticky kids messes.
customer_reviews.author: Losin' It

customer_reviews.title: Incredible buffing for my wood laminate floors!
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about how my wood laminate floors look after they are cleaned. We have dogs so we clean them with a steamer, but even with the right products, they sometimes look dull and streaked. No more! I just use this Bissell Spinwave with the soft pads and buff it. It's quick and easy. Better yet it runs very quietly. For special occasions, I'll use just a touch of furniture polish for a little extra shine! CAUTION: Use polish sparingly as it can make your floors dangerously slippery. Thank you Bissell Spinwave!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry @ Nozone

customer_reviews.title: It’s NOT a mop!
customer_reviews.text: I like this for general cleanup, and for adding a nice sheen and luster to the floor, but it does not take the place of a mop. If you have kids who spill sticky stuff and then don’t catch it right away, this isn’t going to get up any of that sticky mess. This is really more for floors that are already cleaned and mopped in my opinion. It’s like a floor buffer, not a floor cleaner, though my floors do look nice after. Another caveat is that it ONLY will be able to use the Bissell brand floor solution, which I thought didn’t smell very nice or as strongly as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to use. It seems to work well, but so much of it is plastic, I am not sure if it will last. If not, the price is reasonable and I won't mind replacing in a few years if need be. Also included were two small bottles of cleaning solution, one set of scrubber pads and one set of buffing pads. Nice touch Bissell... Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Limited use-minimal messes
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a house with hardwood floors, tiled floor, and laminate wood floors. I needed a mop to help clean them all. This mop does great on the hardwood floors and laminate but is terrible on the tile. It doesn’t get down in the grout to clean and doesn’t pick up dried messes in the kitchen. If I had kids or dogs this would be worthless!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gentle enough for real solid wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine for my solid plank hardwoods. I’ve been using a bona microfiber spray mop-which was fine but I wanted a little more “buffing” without being too harsh on my floors-the Spinwave seems to be enough!!! My floors were looking kind of dull, and they look pretty great now. I just hand sprayed Bona hardwood cleaner down before going over with the Spinwave. I feel like this just gives me a deeper clean than the Bona. It’s lightweight and glides across the floor. My hardwoods are sealed.
customer_reviews.author: aduff

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this spinwave. It makes mopping so easy. Easy to control and glides across the floor. I have a bad shoulder and this causes no discomfort. Works great on hardwood, tile and linoleum. The multifloor cleaner that accompanies works well and smells great. Leaves floor shining with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: M RUSSELL COWAN

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It did a great job quickly cleaning our kitchen hardwood floors. After our 3rd or 4th use, the machine kept turning off after 3-4 minutes of use, and now wont go longer than a few seconds. There is a noticeable "grinding" noise from one of the motors, and it just shuts off. There is no easy way to access the motor, so I can't find or remove something that is causing the problem. Right now its just an expensive and heavy mop
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's Love!
customer_reviews.text: Can't decide if I like this or not! Tried it for the first time and because of the circular motion of the pads, it just seems to want to turn to the side. Took some getting used to and trying to just glide it is hard when you try to go forward. Overall I felt like I was fighting the damn thing the entire time! Will try again. It was nice that it comes basically assembled and ready to use right out of the box. Will update on the love/ hate relationship!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this!! I've only used it once but was very impressed by the power this lightweight electric mop has. It glides on its own and cleans so well. The solution dispenser was half full after i mopped my whole house and i have an open floor plan, so alot of floor to mop. I have a spin mop and the mopping motion is exhausting. I love this mop, only complaint is i wish the cord was a little longer but when you stand the mop upright it cuts off automatically, so no big deal to stop mopping & plug up it up in a different area. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lovern

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine because it is easy to use, does a great job on my vinyl tile and is quiet, surprisingly so. I used the "scrubby" pads which is the only reason for one star short of 4, I am going to get the real scrubby pads for my terrazzo. What I really like about this is I didn't have to move furniture, the head swivels so you can get into tight spots. It was so easy to assemble, just snap the handle in place and the cord is long enough to let me move about my duplex. Overall, great product but I wish I had the more scrubby pads.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalGeek

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, doesn’t clean well and leaves swirls
customer_reviews.text: The mop is easy to use and the washable pads are great HOWEVER the mop does not clean well at all, and leaves swirls on the floor. I vacuum before mopping and mop twice, changing the pads for each mopping. The floor feels clean to walk across barefoot but damp rag drying the damp floor shows that it is, in fact, still dirty. I’ve tried warm and cool water and measured cleaner as directed in the instructions. I’m very disappointed and if I’d had a chance to use before the return period ended I would have. Unfortunately I was out of town.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi

customer_reviews.title: Much better than mopping!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really great. I have a stained cement floor and it is very easy to use. The stuff that Bissell gives you doesn’t work as well as the cement floor stuff but if you spray it in front of the machine, it works well and you don’t have to worry about messing with the warranty. the spray action is very convenient though if you do use their stuff. It is a little heavy once the machine is turned off but while it is on, you could control it with two fingers. I only wish that the cord was a little bit longer but I just put an extension cord when I use it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner floors, less effort
customer_reviews.text: I love my new mop. My hardwood floors are so much cleaner with so much less effort than regular mopping. The only con so far is that I agree with several other reviews that the whole thing would benefit from having more weight. I might figure out a way to add more weight to the head. Other than that, though, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Meh.. so so
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job on my laminate wood floors and makes cleaning really quick and easy. I also have stone paver-like floors with grout that the soft cotton pads really don't do a good job on. And it looks like it does practically nothing to clean the grout. I wish this came with a hard brush for scrubbing and possibly had variable speeds to spin a little faster. Oh well, at least it cleans my wood floors well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Robb

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept, but the cleaner they supply leaves a film on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: As a floor cleaner it does what it's supposed to do, my only complaint is the cleaning solution they sell for it. I have tried mixing this formula in 3-4 different ratios, and none of them seem to help with the film it leaves behind. It's great at scrubbing our laminate floors, I just wish it didn't leave a film behind. I may start trying a different brand of floor cleaning solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working within 1 year of purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mop a year ago for cleaning my apartment, right now when I try to use the mop the rotating mop pads don’t rotate unless or until I lift it from the floor. I’m not planning to clean the air with it so the product at current state is not very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Adithi

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for about 6 months when the left spin mop stopped working. It worked as advertised. After reading some of the ratings there seems to be some confusion on what this product does. Its a cleaner and polisher not a vacuum. You must vacuum all the debris from the floor first. Then clean and polish, it will get up the spots and do a good job with cleaning and polishing wood and tile floors. It will not pick debris up. We have about 1500 sqr ft of wood flr and 800 sqr ft of tile. It works well as long as its working.
customer_reviews.author: SSPrimeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Self-propelled, easy to use, not good on hard stuck on messes
customer_reviews.text: This mop is a great purchase if you have limited mobility, or mopping is hard on you physically. It takes twice as long as regular mopping, and does not get up hard stuck on messes. But, if you have the time to be patient, it is super easy to put together, and simple to use. It came with two bottles of floor cleaner, and you don't use that much of it, so it will last a while. I also really like that a portion of the sales goes towards homeless pets!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Rotors fall off
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a better star rating, I'd rate it at zero. I ordered the spin wave twice and both times the rotors came off. The one I have now, I can't even tighten the screw that holds the rotor on. There is a flaw in the engineering of the product. I love the concept and loved using it, when it would hold together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved until it broke
customer_reviews.text: Owned this just a little over the 2-year warranty (Figures!). I loved it until it just stopped spraying. All the troubleshooting tips from Bissell failed so now I need to go shopping again. When it worked I really liked it except the cord was a little too short and was in a weird spot so it was in the way a bit and awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning the floor a no-brainer!
customer_reviews.text: This works like a dream. I was hesitant for the price - tempted by other more expensive machines with extra options. However, this does everything I need it to do! We have an entire first floor of travertine marble and keeping it clean used to mean mop, scrub, rinse, dry. Now I use this machine with the cleaner enclosed, throw the pads in the washer/dryer and I'm done. No more hands and knees scrubbing! AND my floor is clean! Easy to operate. I can't say enough. I love this new friend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Lou

customer_reviews.title: Home use floor buffer.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to clean my hardwood floors beyond a glorified Swiffer. Directions for use were very easy to follow. Attach pads, fill tank with water and solution and buff away. I prefer the "scrubbing" pads for cleaning vs. the regular ones. Huge difference in how clean my floors were. After use, I always rinse the pads in hot water to remove debris before running through the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Katieq56

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to deep clean the work area of my business. After COVID, we've been bleaching *everything* and our waxed floor looked 100 years old. I used this Bissell cleaner to clean the wax floors before we had a professional company come in for the strip and wax. The Bissell got up SO MUCH dirt off of the floor we almost cancelled the professional guys. If the scrub pads had a wider diameter, I would have given this 5 stars. But, overall, I'm happy with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR MINOR DIRT BUT NOT FOR DEEP CLEANING
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and I love using it on my hardwood floors. It is so much easier than a mop. That being said, it doesn't pick up little particles so you have to sweep or vacuum first (which is totally fine because this product is a mop not a vacuum). However, if you want to deep clean some spills that have dried or a piss stain that has dried, it will NOT clean it up. Overall, I use it for regular shoe tracks or dirty paws and it works great for that!
customer_reviews.author: Nicollette Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and quite but packs a punch with cleaning and shining your floor!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable!! It really shines the floor with ease. My 9 yr. old loves the color since it reminded her of Buzz Lightyear! She was able to help me mop and buff the floor. Amazing product and it shines the floor with the buffering pads! Definitely would recommend this product to all my family and friends. Also can't beat the Black Friday price!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mop when we got it this year. Great clean on our hardwood floors, lightweight, easy to use and clean, but one of the rotation disks stopped working. We have tried to fix it ourselves and sometimes we get some improvement, but it doesn’t resolve the issue. I would love to get it again if I knew it would work... Now I fear I would just be throwing good money after bad.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Aldridge-Saur

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money... the spinners did not rotate and I called the manufacturer to replace the whole mop and they send me more of the piece which was not working and provided me an address where I could take the mop to to have it repaired. Needless to say when I went there and gave them my mop to have it serviced they charged me $47 dollars to repair it... I just left the mop... I didn’t even pay the $47 it wasn’t worth it. I will never owe a biselle anything.
customer_reviews.author: Cherese

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My pet peeve is a dirty floor. I love this thing! Hate wringing and storing dirty mops. This allows me to throw the pads in the washer and avoid scrubbing on the ground. The only thing is it can’t get into corners and edges need special attention as well. I had a steam mop which is great on tile but not for hardwood. This is also cheaper than the going rate for a single housecleaning.
customer_reviews.author: sfdoc

customer_reviews.title: Mopping Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews for products, but this thing is absolutely amazing. I've always hated mopping; it's sweaty work, and with three floors of hardwood and tile, it's time consuming. I used the spinwave for the first time today and I was blown away. It's super easy to use, and I was able to get the whole house done in a fraction of the time it used to take me. I love that it angles down low enough to fit under most of my furniture as well. Guess I won't be putting off mopping floors anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Impractical and not super helpful with anything but making floors shiny
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a few months and I would only recommend it if you already have prestine floors and just want to make them look nice and shiny. It doesn't really clean anything off the floor at all. It just pushes the dirt around. As someone with a toddler and German Shepherd, I thought this product would help reduce the time it takes to clean. However, I just have to add this to the sweeping, mopping, deep cleaning regime I already had. It does make the floors look nice, but that's only after I've done 10 other chores to make sure there isn't a single thing on my floor before using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deebird

customer_reviews.title: This is a great machine!
customer_reviews.text: This thing washes mastiff drool off the floor. That stuff is like glue! I was so tired of scrubbing. One of the spinners broke so I called customer service and they are sending me a new spinner. I love that about Bissell. Problems can arise with anything, but when they stand behind their product, that"s what keeps me coming back!
customer_reviews.author: Dog mom 1

customer_reviews.title: Wood floor game changer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I tried the sample multi floor cleaner to start with. That worked great on my tile floors but dulled my wood. I switched to a wood floor specific cleaner and it worked great. I have kids, dogs and cats And a lot of weekly grime. This cut right through all of it without the back breaking work of mopping and towel drying. I hesitated to buy this because it’s another electric gadget and seemed like a lot of money for a mop. It’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Kalmbach

customer_reviews.title: Great machine! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something like this— in love with it! I have two dogs- that like to drool and leave drool marks all over the floors and that drives me nuts. This machine was great. Had to go over it just a couple of times to get drool up. Floor look awesome. Takes a little bit of time. One speed on machine. I found it relaxing. Oddly enough. Comes with two little bottles ones is for cleaning multi different floors.. ie tile, etc. the other was just for wood. I bought the package that came with extra pads and a bigger bottle of cleaner. Cleaner goes a long way. You dilute with water. Cleans and buffs
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Just use a regular mop
customer_reviews.text: This product was beyond disappointing. First of all, it does not deep clean as it claims to do. Some good old elbow grease with a $10 mop will do much better. It also took longer than what it would to use a regular mop. The only two pros that I have for this is that I didn’t have to go out to the garage to get my mop bucket and go outside to dump it, and it does clean under the edges a little better than a regular mop (which is way I gave it two stars). Long story, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hawksworth

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this instead of the cross wave after reading reviews on the cross wave about the stings going out. This is super easy to use! Does make mopping so Easy and the reusable pads are awesome. I had some particularly nasty floors I needed to clean in a rent house though and for heavy duty hardcore scrubbing, not a good match. But honestly those floors needed to be ripped up they were so bad. So still a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Jess D

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the cleaner solution
customer_reviews.text: Really love this mop. It so much easier to mop my hard wood floors. However the cleaning agent they give to use for it leave steaks so I wouldn't recommend that. I just dump it and used Murphy oil soap.b
customer_reviews.author: lynna atkins

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have laminate flooring with uneven pattern. Dirt tends to get ground in, in heavily traveled areas. This machine does a great shop and takes the work out of floor cleaning. Instead of the reservoir I use a spray bottle of Fabulosa and spray as I go...
customer_reviews.author: P. Venturacci Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Get a steam mop instead.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product from all the reviews. I was debating between this and a steam mop, I chose this and regret it. It does nothing different than a regular mop would do. I see no difference in the cleanliness of my floors. The only thing it’s good for is to polish my hardwood floors. I ended up buying a steam mop and love it. This just sits in the closet getting dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I really like this floor cleaner! It's so easy to use....just turn it on and it essentially moves by itself. I used the smooth pads for my hardwood floor, and the scrubby pads for my tile/paver kitchen floor. Both floors turned out great with very little effort. I am going to purchase the orange "scrubbier" pads, as I think they might work even better on the paver floor with deep and thick grout lines.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine F

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my floors pretty good. No scrubbing necessary, I just went back and forth over the same spot if needed. You can kind of see streaks from the rotating pads but I dont really care. I currently only have 1 good hand to use, so this really made my life easier. I dont like how it beeps when I press the button for the cleaner to come out, maybe there's an option to shut that off, haven't checked. The pads are easy to clean. Super nice that it actually cleans against the trim. Decently quiet. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor k.

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED TO GET THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It’s light weight, easy to assemble, excellent price which comes with 4 pads that are washable, cleans floors so good!! I have always hated my wood floors which are thought my whole house. I hate cleaning them!!! Used the swifter but got expensive one box would do my whole house just for 1 cleaning. I hated taking them off and back on again 😩. Turned to the old school mop the sponge on a stick and a bucket. It works but to much work for me. This Bissell is the best ever!! I’m serious when I say it basically does the mopping for u!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn bailey

customer_reviews.title: has a mind of its own
customer_reviews.text: This machine is hard to handle. It is more like self-propelled and gets a little out of control at times. I have to grab it with both hands to keep it under control. I don't feel like it does a really great job on deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Rkins

customer_reviews.title: Thank you bissell for making this chore so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely loving this. It gets the surface grime off the floors and makes my hardwood floors shine. My floors feel and look clean as well as making my house smell good. It will not scrub hard enough to clean things like grout because if it did we would all have scratched floors. Update 4/17/20: one side has stopped spinning. I used it alot but for the price I really expected it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Buy this thing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I’ve ever made!!!!! This thing is super quiet, but very heavy so the dirt comes off the floor. It almost pushes itself because of the spinning pads. So. Easy. To. Use!!!!!!! Literally popped the handle up, filled the solution bottle and off I go! I probably only use one squirt of solution per 5 sq ft section. AND NO STREAKS! Our glossy laminate floors are hard to clean because every cleaner either leaves a greasy residue or streaks and this does neither! See pic. Such a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: A good little mop especially if you have pets.
customer_reviews.text: Saves a lot of time! One thing to note when using is that you will get buff marks if you use too much liquid. To avoid this just use a little until you figure out what works for tour floors. Also, if you notice one of the spinners doesn’t work well...tighten the screws on the spinners. They come loose with the vibrations!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C.

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I was actually a little doubt full about this mop since I had another mop from them and it didn't work. but this one amazed me. the cleaning pads just stick on brings its own two bottle of samples. it turns on fast, no need to wait. just click the power button and the button so I can squirt out water and bomb, its ready for cleaning. one thing tho it takes a little control since it is a spin wave but nothing you can't handle.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the cost. Gets the job done if you have large rooms.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model after trying 3 others. I use it on my laminate kitchen floor and bamboo laminate flooring. I prefer this model over the battery powered one. I have 2 large rooms to clean and the battery powered model did not last long enough to complete the job. So if you have large rooms, buy this model. The value is good. I just wish the cord was longer. Overall I do recommend this Bissell model. Don’t purchase off name brands. Made a lot cheaper for around the same money you would pay for this one. Hope this review helps. I rely heavily on them. 💜😘💜
customer_reviews.author: palomino627

customer_reviews.title: Never use a mop again
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this floor cleaner. I have hand and spine arthritis and cannot use a regular mop. This Spinware glides across the floor and is so easy on the hands and back. It cleans tile great. I live that you use your own floor cleaner. I also have Nucore waterproof plank flooring (wood look) and I only spray lightly to clean. I highly suggest buying an extra set of pads. You just throw them in the washer to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive floor cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond impressed with this wonderful item, I wish I would have discovered it sooner. I will be one of your biggest sales people come Christmas time, my family is all getting one.
customer_reviews.author: shannon a brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality problem
customer_reviews.text: While this does work well on hard floors, after I’d had it about 2 months, one side of the spinner things that holds the pads started going at a slower pace than the other one. I bought this to be a temporary replacement while my Oreck Orbiter was in the shop, and while it’s considerably less expensive than the Oreck, I would still expect it to last a lot longer than it has. Cheaper is not better in this case. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mop. It really doesn’t do much better on my tile floors than I could pushing a swifter around, and doesn’t really scrub like I thought it would. It does alright on hardwood, and the buffing pads work with the wood cleaner to shine the floors. It’s also really heavy, and cumbersome to store. For the price I definitely wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: habow

customer_reviews.title: So impressed. Love.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my word. I am shook. This thing is fabulous. I clean my floors often and I have a puppy and I thought my floor was clean... until I fired this bad boy up. Amazing. It glides easy super easy to put together and use. The cleaner smells nice and clean. You can see the difference. So impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: This mop is AMAZING! It's so light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This mop is AMAZING! It's so light and easy to use, that I actually look forward to mopping my floors now. I use it primarily on my laminated wood flooring. Several reviewers noted that it leaves swirl marks on their floors, but I found that if you go over the spot more than once, there are no swirl marks left. I ordered a set of replacement pads so that I can toss the dirty ones in the laundry each week and not have to wait for them to get clean. The mop feels like it is self-propelled--it is so effortless to use. This was money well-spent, and I would definitely order it again!
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Bust
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT order items like this on Amazon if you have any problems you have to contact the manufacturer. When I received this item it was missing the scrubbing mops. Once I tried to use it only 1 mop would spin. Defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Tamrock

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, terrible performace
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be an amazing product as I am a busy mom with a large dog. I have always been a hands and knees type of cleaner and just needed something to get me through the coronavirus and having my children at home with me constantly. Unfortunately the spinwave just smeared the dirty foot prints around my floors instead of cleaning them. I would have much rather returned the product to try the crosswave which seems to be more of a carpet scrubber but for hard floors, but got on and wasn't eligible to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Tenney

customer_reviews.title: Does a job well done
customer_reviews.text: Cleans better than expected. My son loves cleaning all the floors in the house with this item. They provided extra pads and pads with soft scrubbers. Very efficient and easy to store. Not loud, thank goodness. Not scary for my pet. It comes with more than enough solution for more than 3 uses The height is just right. I'm 5'7". Its perfect for me and the cord is long enough to reach. It doesn't work well in corners but you can manage along the wall in each direction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try 2, both have the same problem
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea but quality is an issue my both of mine. Bought one 18 months ago and one side of the spinner stop working after 8 months. Thinking it could be just that one. Bought another one in May and the same thing happen after 3 months. Looks like quality issue. Will try to return the 2nd one and I’m anticipating bad result. Will see and will update base on how they are responding to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does a good job
customer_reviews.text: This product is light and easy to use. It has cleaning disks that seem to have a bit of bristle embedded into them which may clean a bit better. The disks operate in an alternating fashion which helps to make sure that no spots are missed. The spray comes out the front and works very well. I'm sure if you scrubbed on your hands and knees, you could do a better job, but really this is quite a good machine.
customer_reviews.author: PeachyRose

product_meta.title: BISSELL Spinwave Powered Hardwood Floor Mop and Cleaner, Green Spinwave
product_meta.description: Style Name:Spinwave OnlyTired of scrubbing your floors let the Bissell spinwave powered hard floor mop do it for you. Safe for cleaning sealed, hard-surface floors like tile, linoleum, vinyl flooring, and hardwood floors, this versatile machine comes with a set of soft touch cleaning pads for everyday cleaning and scrubby pads for tough, sticky messes. Power spin pads reduce cleaning effort while giving you a hands-and-knees clean. Bissell spinwave is also equipped with on-demand spray that allows you to dispense just the right amount of multi-surface solution onto your floors. In addition, swivel steering makes it easy to maneuver around and under furniture. Includes a 2-year limited. Surface type: Bare floors, sealed hard floors. Surface cleaning: Sealed hard floors. Cleaning path width: 14 inch. Tank capacity: 28 ounce; Cleaning area: Bare floors, sealed hard floors. Buying this product saves pets. Bissell proudly supports Bissell pet foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a Bissell product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.
feature_bullets: Powered hard floor mop scrubs your floors so you don't have to
Safe for cleaning sealed, hard surface floors; 28 ounce clean water tank capacity. Power rating : 0.9 ampere
Includes soft touch pads for gentle cleaning on hardwood floors and scrubby pads for tough, sticky messes
Reduces cleaning effort with power spin pads for a hands and knees clean. Carpet attachment-no
On demand spray allows you to dispense just the right amount of solution onto your floors

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars4,066 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
